name: biscuit
abstract: A bitmap index optimized for LIKE and ILIKE wildcard pattern matching in PostgreSQL
description: biscuit is a PostgreSQL index access method that accelerates LIKE and ILIKE wildcard pattern matching using in-memory bitmap indexing. It is designed for deterministic, case-insensitive, and multi-column pattern searches, complementing B-tree and pg_trgm indexes rather than replacing them.
